name: nag
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to criticize or complain often in an annoying way, especially in order to try and make someone do something: [ + obj + to infinitive ] My mum's always nagging me to get my hair cut. If you stop nagging at me, I might actually do it. I'm always nagging him about his diet.

nag noun [C]
(PERSON)
